title: James Dean's Car Safety Movie
subtitle: The rumors: Shortly before he died in a car accident, James Dean advised young car drivers to "take the drive easily - it may be the life you save me."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Before he died in a car accident shortly, James Dean advised young car drivers to "take it easy to drive, so the life you might save may be mine.
